metadata.name: Airthings Masters Trophy
metadata.description:
Experience the Champions Chess Tour in person!

Inspired by esports, this is the first of six unique trophies created for the Champions Chess Tour 2023 by various artists. Exclusively, the trophy will allow the owner to attend the tour finals of this year's tour.

Just like last year, three trophies will be made for each of the events on the tour. One for the winner, one for the partner, one for the fans. The first trophy is designed by the talented graphic artists at [IMMORTAL](https://www.immortalprojects.io/), the parent company of Chess Champs.

Holder: Please claim your ticket at [info@chesschamps.io](mailto:info@chesschamps.io). The ticket is tethered to the trophy.

Note: Transportation and accommodation is not included when attending the final event.
